title: 探险活宝混搭包即将登陆PE/Win10/主机版
author: 广药
txt_content:
本帖最后由 WuGuangYao2012 于 2017-5-24 13:06 编辑 
It's Adventure Time! Join Finn the human and Jake the dog in a Minecraft world like no other. Protect the candy citizens of Ooo from some familiar foes, or run amok in the colourful wonders of the Adventure Time universe! Coming soon to Pocket, Win 10 and console!
探险时间到了！像其他人一样在Minecraft中加入阿宝和杰克，保护熟悉的哇赛秘境，在奇奇怪怪的探险世界宇宙中狂奔！即将登陆PE/Win10和主机版！

关于探险活宝：探险活宝的百度百科

B站中字：https://www.bilibili.com/video/av10779383/
http://share.acg.tv/flash.swf?aid=10779383&page=1
